8eto73r3rhydn8oj2qf0nqaorijk4494r3g0ggid.content:
Get 10% cashback on your credit card use

Hi %%FirstName%%
We have noticed that you have not used your credit card since 30 days.
So here we are offering you a discount of 15%. You can always use the cards at you nearest Walmart centers and redeem the accumulated points later on!
This email was sent by: %%Member_Busname%%
%%Member_Addr%% %%Member_City%%, %%Member_State%%, %%Member_PostalCode%%, %%Member_Country%%

Get 10% cashback on your credit card use

Está a solo un clic de distancia para ganar reembolsos y emocionantes cupones en su tarjeta de crédito. Gana puntos de recompensa en cada compra y reemátalos en tu tienda walmart más cercana o puedes elegir los cupones electrónicos en nuestra tienda citi.

data.name: Offerwise
data.queryText:
Select distinct a.Customer_id as CustomerId,b.Email_Address,b.FirstName , a.Transaction_Date,
Case When Datediff(Day,Transaction_Date,GETDATE()) =30 THEN '10Percent'
     When Datediff(Day,Transaction_Date,GETDATE()) =60 THEN '30Percent' ELSE 'ZERO' END AS Offer From {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/bfdd1050-bb16-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/bfdd1050-bb16-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}] a 
INNER JOIN {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/3ccddd28-b716-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/3ccddd28-b716-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}] b on a.Customer_id =b.Customerid

data.name: CardNotusing_Last30days
data.queryText:
Select a.CustomerId,a.Email_Address,a.FirstName, b.Transaction_date From {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/3ccddd28-b716-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/3ccddd28-b716-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}] a 
INNER JOIN {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/bfdd1050-bb16-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/bfdd1050-bb16-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}]  b on a.CustomerId=b.Customer_Id
Where b.Transaction_date >= DATEADD(Day,-30,GETDATE())

data.name: Counting_Of_Days
data.description: Who are Not using credit card 30 days and More then 30 days
data.queryText:
select ccid, FirstName, City, CC_Acquire_Date, CC_Last_Used_Date, Email,
Datediff(Day,CC_Last_Used_Date,GETDATE()) As Counter
from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/35f9222d-1e20-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/35f9222d-1e20-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}] Where Email_Opt_Status = 'Active'

data.name: CreditCard_used_last7days
data.queryText:
select ccid, FirstName, City, CC_Acquire_Date, CC_Last_Used_Date, Email,'Cardused' As Card_Status
from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/a37d7496-b925-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/a37d7496-b925-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}]
Where counter BETWEEN 1 and 7

data.name: CreditCard_Notused_last30days
data.queryText:
select ccid, FirstName, City, CC_Acquire_Date, CC_Last_Used_Date, Email,'CardNotused' As Card_Status
from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/a37d7496-b925-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/a37d7496-b925-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}]
Where counter >=30 And ccid Not In (Select ccid from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/e556650e-b525-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/e556650e-b525-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}])

data.name: PKT_CC-30 D not used
data.queryText:
Select a.ccid, a.FirstName, a.City, a.CC_Acquire_Date, a.CC_Last_Used_Date, a.Email,a.Card_Status from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/b27ecbfb-b425-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/b27ecbfb-b425-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}] a
UNION ALL
Select  b.ccid, b.FirstName, b.City, b.CC_Acquire_Date, b.CC_Last_Used_Date, b.Email,b.Card_Status from {{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/e556650e-b525-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/namePrefix}}[{{mcpm#/entities/dataExtensions/e556650e-b525-ec11-b82e-48df37d1deb7/data/name}}] b
